title: Martin Luther King and Malcolm X - difference

content.question: At the time the excerpts were written, Martin Luther King, Jr., disagreed with Malcolm X in that King believed that

choices.label: confrontation would be an effective means of achieving change
the most desirable outcome of Civil Rights activism would be equal rights and racial integration
Civil Rights activism has its roots in earlier historical patterns
moderation and conciliation would hamper African Americans from gaining civil rights

content.answer: the most desirable outcome of Civil Rights activism would be equal rights and racial integration

topic.text: 8.10: The African American Civil Rights Movement (1960s)

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
